{{Infobox company | name = Kalydo | logo = [[Image:KalydoLogo.png|255px]] | type = [[Privately held company|Private]] | foundation = [[Eindhoven]] (2006) | founder = [[Doki Tops]],[[Mark Schroders]],[[Rob van Gulik]],[[Chris van der Linden]] | location_city = [[Eindhoven]], [[Netherlands]] | area_served = Worldwide | key_people = | industry = {{ubl|[[Cloud computing]]|[[Video game industry|Video games]]}} | products = [[Kalydo|Kalydo]] | services = [[Cloud_gaming|Cloud Gaming]] | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | assets = | equity = | owner = | num_employees = | parent = | divisions = | homepage = {{URL|http://www.kalydo.com|Kalydo.com}} | footnotes = }}
'''Kalydo''' is a [[Cloud_gaming|cloud gaming]] technology and service based on file streaming. The Kalydo platform launched commercially in 2008 and has been in service since. The Kalydo [[Cloud_gaming|file streaming]] technology allows games to be played immediately, without the need of downloading and installation, providing faster and easier access to games. Games running on Kalydo do so via the proprietary Kalydo Player [[Plug-in_(computing)|plugin]] and can run in a [[Browser_game|browser]], or from the PC desktop.
Many games that have been launched using Kalydo are subsequently serviced through social networks and game portals such as [[Facebook|Facebook]], [[Kongregate|Kongregate]] and [[Miniclip|Mini Clip]].
Since its founding in 2006, Kalydo has become one of the three most well known cloud gaming providers [[Gaikai|Gaikai]], [[Onlive|OnLive]] and [[Kalydo|Kalydo]].
==History== The Kalydo platform launched in 2008, initially under a [[Software release life cycle#Beta|beta flag]]. Shortly after the service went commercially live. One of the first titles to launch on the Kalydo service was sports game OnGolf and [http://www.onrpg.com/games/hovorun/ HovoRun], the latter was cancelled by the game's publisher before going live.
In years to follow an increasing number of titles launched on Kalydo including [http://www.cinemablend.com/games/IGG-Kalydo-Team-Up-Facebook-MMORPG-Releases-28037.html Godswar] by IGG, [http://mmohuts.com/news/requiem-now-available-in-your-browser Requiem] by Gravity, [http://kalydo.com/2011/11/runes-of-magic-goes-browser-with-kalydo/ Runes of Magic] by Frogster and Formula Cartoon by Cartoon Network. Some titles have since been discontinued by the publisher, while others remain active through Kalydo.
==Technology== ===Kalydo Player=== The Kalydo cloud gaming technology is based on [[Cloud_gaming#Cloud_gaming_based_on_file_streaming|file streaming]], through a small proprietary [[Plug-in_(computing)|plugin]] called the Kalydo Player (2.5 mb size) which is installed once on the end user's PC. The Kalydo Player handles various tasks such requesting data before and during play and authentication. When an end user plays a Kalydo powered game, the Kalydo Player requests and downloads the first game data needed to start playing. During play, remaining game content is downloaded dynamically. Using advanced methods of progressive downloading, data compression and prediction algorithms, Kalydo is able to provide a smooth game play experience.
The data downloaded by the Kalydo Player is stored locally ([[Cache_(computing)|cashed]])on the computers hard drive. This way the next time an end user plays the game, the same data does not have to be downloaded again. Games played through Kalydo are also added to the Windows Program Files list, where they can be un-installed like a regular application.
===File streaming=== Cloud gaming technologies are generally based on [[Cloud_gaming#Cloud_gaming_based_on_file_streaming|file streaming]] or [[Cloud_gaming#Cloud_gaming_based_on_video_streaming|pixel streaming]]. Kalydo's technology is based on file streaming which has a [[Bandwidth (computing)|low bandwidth]] requirement to operate and is less sensitive to problems associated with pixel streaming such as lag and the need of a high speed internet connection. The cloud is used to provide a highly scalable infrastructure to [[Downloading|stream]] the game content and [[Big_data|handle big data processing]].
==International availability== Kalydo is available worldwide, including low bandwidth countries such as Malaysia, Philippines and Thailand. Kalydo's service is based on cloud gaming through [[Cloud_gaming#Cloud_gaming_based_on_file_streaming|file streaming]], which makes it possible to operate on a low speed internet connection.
==Games using Kalydo== *Remnant Knights (2013 GameSamba) *Last Chaos (2012 Gamigo) *Formula Cartoon by Cartoon Network *[[Soul Captor]] (2012 Gamania - game discontinued) *[[Runes of Magic]] (Released 24 April 2012)<ref>{{cite web|url=http://kalydo.blogspot.com/2011/02/runes-of-magic-goes-browser-with-kalydo.html |title=Kalydo: Runes of Magic goes Browser with Kalydo |publisher=Kalydo.blogspot.com |date=2011-02-25 |accessdate=2012-04-09}}</ref> Developer: Runewaker Publisher: Frogster Interactive *[[Requiem: Memento Mori|Requiem]] (Beta 24 April 2012) *[[Nostale]] (2012 Gameforge - game discontinued) *[[Emil Chronicle Online]] (2012 - Gungho) *[[Crazy Car]] (2011 ChiYu games ) *[[Conquer Online]] (2011 - Netdragon) *[[4Story]] (2011 - Gameforge) *[[GodsWar Online]] [[IGG]] (Facebook version)<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.facebook.com/apps/application.php?id=134688186584581 |title=GodsWar on Facebook |publisher=Facebook.com |date= |accessdate=2012-04-09}}</ref> * onGOLF by ColdWood Interactive <ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.ongolf.com/ |title=Beta - Free to play online golf game |publisher=onGolf.com |date= |accessdate=2012-04-09}}</ref>
==Notes== {{Reflist|2}}

* [http://kalydo.com/2013/04/gamesamba-launches-remnant-knights-mmo-with-kalydo-cloud-gaming-app/ Remnant Knights launches on Kalydo] *[http://www.gamasutra.com/view/pressreleases/191149/GameSamba_launches_Remnant_Knights_MMO_with_Kalydo_cloudgaming_app.php Remnant Knights now live with Kalydo desktop cloud game app] *[http://kalydo.com/2013/04/neowiz-signs-with-kalydo/ Neowiz signs with Kalydo] *[http://kalydo.com/2013/03/cloud-gaming-service-kalydo-launches-on-chinas-no-1-social-network-from-tencent/ Kalydo launches on Qzone, China's largest social network] *[http://kalydo.com/2013/02/kalydo-introduces-private-cloud-solution-for-game-publishers/ Kalydo introduces private cloud solution for developers and publishers] *[http://kalydo.com/2012/12/cog-signs-with-kalydo-for-war-of-glory/ Kalydo signs with COG] *[http://kalydo.com/2012/09/4story-launches-in-over-10-countries/ 4Story launches in 10 countries with Kalydo] *[http://kalydo.com/2012/07/soul-captor-live-on-kalydo/ Soul Captor launches on Kalydo] *[http://kalydo.com/2012/04/gravity-launches-requiem-on-kalydo/ Gravity launches Requiem on Kalydo] *[http://kalydo.com/2012/04/runes-of-magic-commercially-launched-on-kalydo/ Runes of Magic launches on Kalydo] *[http://kalydo.com/2012/04/nostale-launches-succesful-beta/ Nostale launches on Kalydo] *[http://kalydo.com/2011/03/browser-version-of-runes-of-magic-debuts-on-german-tv/ Runes of Magic on Kalydo debuts on German TV] * [http://thenextweb.com/eu/2011/01/26/impressively-fast-loading-3d-facebook-game-godswar-online-hits-1-5m-users-in-a-month/ The Next Web on GodsWar] * [http://thenextweb.com/eu/2011/02/27/the-future-of-gaming-is-the-browser-7gb-3d-game-squeezed-into-facebook/ The Next Web on Runes of Magic]
